price: Qur'ani ya Kiarabu isiyo na upogo, ili wamche Mungu.
arabic: قُرۡءَانًا عَرَبِيًّا غَيۡرَ ذِي عِوَجٖ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَّقُونَ
footnotes: Tumeiteremsha Qur'ani ya Kiarabu kwa ulimi wao, haina upungufu, kwa kutaraji kuwa watamcha na watamwogopa Mola wao Mlezi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qur'ānan ʿarabiyyan ghayra dhī ʿiwajin laʿallahum yattaqūna
